title: Spiced quinoa, butternut squash and kale salad
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil, divided', '1/2 teaspoon ground cumin', '1/2 teaspoon dried oregano', '1/2 teaspoon chilli powder', '1/2 teaspoon sea salt', 'freshly ground black pepper to taste', '1/2 butternut squash - peeled, seeded and cubed', '1 courgette, cubed', '475ml water', '175g quinoa', '60g chopped kale', '120g chopped flat leaf parsley', '80g raisins', '80g chopped red onion', '4 tablespoons apple cider vinegar', '1 tablespoon honey']
